    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(@Nonnull
             GriffonController controller,
             @Nonnull
             String actionName,
             @Nonnull
             Method method)
        Description copied from interface: ActionInterceptor
        Inspect the action during the configuration phase.

        This is the perfect time to search for annotations or any other information required by the action. Interceptors have the option to cache such inspections and recall them during before(), after() and exception().

        Specified by:
        configure in interface ActionInterceptor
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that owns the action
        actionName - the action's name
        method - the method that represents the action itself

      • before

        @Nonnull
public Object[] before(@Nonnull
                      GriffonController controller,
                      @Nonnull
                      String actionName,
                      @Nonnull
                      Object[] args)
        Description copied from interface: ActionInterceptor
        Called before an action is executed.

        Implementors have the choice of throwing an AbortActionExecution in order to signal that the action should not be invoked. In any case this method returns the arguments to be sent to the action, thus allowing the interceptor to modify the arguments as it deem necessary. Failure to return an appropriate value will most likely cause an error during the action's execution.

        Specified by:
        before in interface ActionInterceptor
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that owns the action
        actionName - the action's name
        args - the action's arguments
        Returns:
        arguments to be sent to the action

      • after

         GriffonController controller,
         @Nonnull
         String actionName,
         @Nonnull
         Object[] args)
        Description copied from interface: ActionInterceptor
        Called after the action has been aborted or executed, even if an exception occurred during execution.

        Specified by:
        after in interface ActionInterceptor
        Parameters:
        status - a flag that indicates the execution status of the action
        controller - the controller that owns the action
        actionName - the action's name
        args - the arguments sent to the action

      • exception

        public boolean exception(@Nonnull
                Exception exception,
                @Nonnull
                GriffonController controller,
                @Nonnull
                String actionName,
                @Nonnull
                Object[] args)
        Description copied from interface: ActionInterceptor
        Called after the action has been executed when an exception occurred during execution.

        The exception will be rethrown by the ActionManager if is not handled by any interceptor.

        Specified by:
        exception in interface ActionInterceptor
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception thrown during the action's execution
        controller - the controller that owns the action
        actionName - the action's name
        args - the arguments sent to the action during execution
        Returns:
        true if the exception was handled successfully, false otherwise.
